favourite.article: There are no words better to discribe the Love of God than the hymns we are blessed with all praise to our God.
A very beautiful Song. I will learn it and sing as special music in church.
"Dark Calvary" - there is no darker time than the hour in which Christ shed His blood for sin! "Blest Calvary" - that is a blest hour indeed in which my Savior died for me!
Amazing Grace! Thank you for including this song of the Greatest Love story ever known.
It reminds me of my Savior who died on the cross for me.
Oh my good GOD. You are so amazing so blessing keep it up. This song on calvery is so touching. Thanks a lot.
When I was 12 My dad taught me this song which it was wiped away from my mind. We sang this hymn in the church with parts on the adoration day. It is a beautiful hymn.

This is a wonderful song. "Oh Jesus Lord, How cans't it be that Thou shoulds't give Thy life for me..." We sang this with original notes in my 9th grade, and find this song after so many years. Thanks a lot. God bless you. It would be great if we can have the notes also.
